question: What is Green Cloud Nine?
answer: Green Cloud Nine is an online marketplace that brings a wide range of sustainable products and services directly to eco-conscious consumers

question: What makes Green Cloud Nine different from other marketplaces, such as Amazon, Etsy, etc?
answer: Green Cloud Nine is a marketplace dedicated only to sustainable products and services. We promote fairness, support local producers, and are champions of replacing wasteful, polluting products with sustainable alternatives. We also help customers to buy more responsibly and access a much bigger number of sustainable products online. Our commitment to transparency means that we will work hard to ensure the sustainability of vendors and products on our platform. In this way, we want to speed up the transition to a fairer and more eco-friendly economy.

question: How do we define sustainability at Green Cloud Nine?
answer: For us, sustainability means to use natural, social and economic resources in a way that allows us to meet our needs, but also respects the right of future generations to cover their own. To be fair & transparent to our customers and vendors, we adopt a holistic approach that considers both the producer and the product: Our vendors are expected to be sustainable at human, social, economic and environmental levels. Also, to ensure consistency, we have defined 10 product sustainability categories or impact areas. question: What kind of products are sold in Green Cloud Nine?
answer: Our marketplace is open to products in nearly every consumer sector: food & drink, fashion, cosmetics, arts & crafts, etc.

question: In which countries will the platform be available?
answer: To start with, our platform will be available in the European Union. Afterwards we will consider expanding to other countries or regions.

question: When will be the official platform launch?
answer: Work is underway and moving fast! The expected launch date is October 2021.

question: Do you have an app?
answer: Not for now. We plan to create an app in the future.

question: How does it work with the shipment of goods?
answer: At the beginning, every vendor will pack and ship their orders to the customers, just as they do it today. Soon in the future, we will offer a centralized and more sustainable logistic solution that will make it easier, more cost efficient and sustainable to deliver across Europe. More to come on this!

question: Are the shipments CO2 neutral?
answer: That is definitely the goal at Green Cloud Nine. In some countries, vendors will be able to deliver their goods to their customers CO2 neutral. But, for some vendors, offering CO2 neutral deliveries is not yet possible. In this case, we offer the customers a possibility to add a small fee to their order at check-out to offset the CO2 emissions. The fee will be 1% for national & 2% for international deliveries. The customer will be able to select which certified environmental projects they support with this money.
